results.name: Forbidden Ingredient (Passive)
results.description: Increases the Skill Level of the monster by 1 when used as Power-up material.

results.name: Special Ingredient (Passive)
results.description: The XP granted when used as Power-up material, greatly increases according to the monster's level. The XP amount also increases through Awakening.

results.name: Best Ingredient (Passive)
results.description: The XP granted will additionally increase by 50% when used as Power-up material for Monsters with the same attribute.

results.name: Resist Element (Passive)
results.description: Decreases the inflicted damage on the ally from Water, Fire, and Wind attributes by 25%. The effect is not accumulated with other decrease damage effects. [Automatic Effect]

effect.name: Decrease Damage
effect.description: Decreases damage received by a certain amount

results.name: Power of Darkness
results.description: Reflects 30% of the incoming damage for 3 turns and keeps your HP from falling under 1.

effect.name: Reflect DMG
effect.description: 33% of incoming damage is reflected back at the attacker. This does not nullify any Status Effects.

effect.name: Endure
effect.description: Monster temporarily cannot be killed as HP cannot go below 1

results.name: Purify
results.description: Removes all harmful effects on the target ally and recovers its HP. The recovery amount is proportionate to the Attack Power.

effect.name: Heal
effect.description: Increases ally's HP

effect.name: Cleanse
effect.description: Removes one or more debuffs
